reviews.title: MY SUEDE SHOES!
reviews.review_text: I love this shoe! I purchased one pair of each color and from the moment I slipped my foot into the shoe I experienced comfort. The suede is a slight suede and very flexible to adapt and conform to your foot. Seek guidance with the sizing chart. This product is true to size. I love these shoes with casual dress. I can clean them and they look new. The expanable elastic provides comfort at the width/instep area. for more comfort. I am very pleased with the colors and comfort of this product!

reviews.title: My shoes
reviews.review_text: I looked everywhere for light weight shoes . My sneakers were so heavy. I go to dialysis 3x a week so I wanted lighter shoes . These are a perfect fit !!

reviews.title: So Cute!
reviews.review_text: Seems to run on the small side. I ordered a larger size because my feet are wide. Had trouble getting one on but seems to be better now that I've been stretching it out. I love the looks of them though! Just what I was looking for.

I went by the measurements and it was very small,but any bigger it would have flipped off my heel!!!! probably give them to someone,the delivery was SLOW,I wasn't sure if they were coming,the due date was up and there was no update on the tracking,!!

reviews.title: Nice shoes but too big
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable shoes, but they are a size too big. Also, they are slippery. I gave them away mostly due the size.

reviews.title: Nice, but no arch support.
reviews.review_text: I like these shoes, very cute and generally comfy. They work for dresses and pants, casual and dressy. However they have no arch support, so I will need to add insoles if Im going to be doing a lot of standing.

reviews.title: Uncomfortable, cheaply made, slick soles.
reviews.review_text: The toe box was smaller than normal and hurt my toes. However, even if they fit perfectly, I would not recommend these shoes under any circumstances, as they are made of extremely cheap materials. The sole is slick and potentially hazardous, which might cause slipping and falling.
I take a size 8 %26 these too small. There. is no size on them anywhere so I don't know if it's the right size!

reviews.title: UTTOASFAY Womens Clearance Shoes
reviews.review_text: It felt like it would be uncomfortable to walk any distance in. Plus my usual size felt like it was 2 sizes too small

reviews.title: cheaply made
reviews.review_text: Ordered a size 8.5, shoe fits like a size 8. super lightweight and plastic feeling. got them on clearance so my bad. but definitely not worth the money even on clearance.
I really like these, but they were too big. I will try to return them to Store.
The postage was quite a bit. They don't look like the picture.
the color and style was nice but the material was terrible like cardboard must return!!
will order next size but seller should correct sizing info I buy these sizes all the time worst fit ever had

reviews.title: stylish and comfortable
reviews.review_text: very soft flexible and comfortable. they look very nice with skirts or pants. they can be worn all day at work and still be comfortable.

reviews.title: Opinion on shoes purchased
reviews.review_text: I guess I got what I paid for. Not comfortable. Will definitely be giving these away if I can find someone who wants them.

reviews.title: Better than I expected .
reviews.review_text: 1. They fit 2. They are inexpensive but don't look it 3. They're cute 4. No breaking in time necessary

reviews.title: Suede Shoes
reviews.review_text: Good quality of materials, beautiful colors, TRUE TO FIT (as per the size chart) . Very Comfortable shoes. Delivery was earlier than scheduled. I was charged more for the grey pair than the others.

reviews.title: tight
reviews.review_text: i ordered my usual size and man are they tight, if i would of known i would if ordered a bigger size. they are cute, and hopefully i can get them to stretch a bit.
A unique design summer casual shoes that will go with everything due to the neutral color.
Disappointed, this shoe, even though my regular size, is too small/short. need to return.
It was delayed and when it finally arrived the wrong size was sent
i kove these shoes. they sre super comfortable, well made and cute as can be
way,way too small, very cheap, horrible, deserves 0 stars.

reviews.title: Beautiful comfy shoes!!
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product, easy experience, and easy to use website. I highly recommend! Evidence.

reviews.title: Do not recommend
reviews.review_text: These shoes run small and are very cheaply made

reviews.title: not what they seem
reviews.review_text: shoes arrived and they are plastic bittomed, no grip guaranteed to slip. they also run small

reviews.title: small foot
reviews.review_text: I wear a 9, so I ordered a 10, and wish I'd ordered an 11. must have used a chinese foot for template. Also, VERY SLIPPERY BOTTOM SOLE.

reviews.title: Tastefully Designed and Comfortable
reviews.review_text: These slip ons earth-tone sandals are quite nice and affordably priced.. The eyelet cut out on the shoe design is tasteful for dress or pant wear. For foot support and greater comfort, I inserted my orthotics. There was a quality issue with a pinch noticed on the front seam of the right shoe caused by extra glue which I nicked off with a razor, then touched up with a light brown pen from my art supplies - yay, good as new.

reviews.title: Quality with a Sale Price!
reviews.review_text: Imitation suede and true to size fit! Very light weight and comfortable. I chase a 8.5 because of my high instep. Although this is not my normal size I am so happy that I used the Sizing Chqrt. IT HELPED ME CHOOSE THE MOST COMFORTABLE SIZE. The perforated design is of high quality and the shoe was comfortable from the moment I stepped into them. Looks exactly like the picture. I do not notmally order suede in the summer time season but at this price I would like to purchase the other two colors for the fall and winter. I am so very pleased. Please keep sales like this rolling. Thank you, Walmart!!

reviews.title: terribly made
reviews.review_text: these shoes are tereible. They feel as if they are made from hard plastic. soles included. Not only thar there is no traction at all! When I put them on and took a step on my wood floor my foot slid like I was on ice. In bo way is this safe. don't get these.

reviews.title: Too small
reviews.review_text: These shoes are a size 8 and not a size 9 as stated. I ordered 4 pairs of shoes at the same time from different manufacturers and 3 of the pairs fit fine or even are a little large, but this pair runs really small. Fortunately, they were on clearance and very inexpensive, so I just gave them away.

reviews.title: Poorly Made
reviews.review_text: Uneven fit as if slapped together in a hurry. Sole has no cushion at all. The fabric itself is comfortable, but poorly shaped around the ankle so puckered. My feet are a perfect size 7.5 so I expected these to be a little big at size 8, but they put uncomfortable pressure on my big toes that are pushing against the tip of the shoes very disappointing.

reviews.title: Poor design and materials.
reviews.review_text: FLIMSY sides/top; doesn't fit for the "9" ordered.

reviews.title: shoes
reviews.review_text: they fit and went with the dress I got them for.

reviews.title: slipons
reviews.review_text: very thin, feels sadly like paper, hope thryre not

reviews.title: cute shoes
reviews.review_text: These shoes are cute, but they run small. I ordered a 7.5, which is what I always wear, but it was too small. I ordered an 8, and my big toe is still crunched into the end. I'm not sure if I'll try an 8.5.

reviews.title: RUNS ABOUT A FULL SIZE SMALLER THAN INDICATED
reviews.review_text: Seemed cheaply made and the overall fit felt odd on the foot. Ordered 8.5 size and had to be a size 7 or 7.5 so I rated that it runs about a whole size smaller than indicated. They were cute for not a good shoe. Would not reccomend.

reviews.title: wasted effort
reviews.review_text: These shoes ran ridiculously small, and had to be returned. They were very stylish in the picture, but didn't live up to my expectations, not to mention, they didn't fit. I was very disappointed.

reviews.title: So cute
reviews.review_text: So cute, but not true to size. I got my size,but they were a size too small. I would upsize if you can. The shoes were very light... I just wish i didn't have to return them. 2 stars for the cuteness.

reviews.title: Shoes
reviews.review_text: These shoes run big so be careful. I have been upsizing from my usual 8 1/2 lately due to shoes being tight however these run a bit bigger so my 8 1/2 would have worked.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: The shoes were supposed to be opened toed and they were closed toed. They were my size but were clearly way too wide for my feet. I can't wear them clearly.

reviews.title: Super cute!
reviews.review_text: I can wear these shoes with almost anything in my spring and summer wardrobe!
not as cute as pictured if I had to order them again I would order a half size water they kill my feet when I wear them

reviews.title: Beautiful Shirt
reviews.review_text: This shirt is prettier than I expected it to be even though it is exactly what I wanted. The color is perfect. Love it! ❤️

reviews.title: Refund Wanted.
reviews.review_text: Cheap material shoes will not order anymore and they didn't fit too small. I returned them still haven't received my refund.

reviews.title: They sent the Wrong Size.
reviews.review_text: Delivery was extremely slow it took longer than expected, and to make things worse they sent the wrong size. I had to send them back.

reviews.title: Womens summer shoes
reviews.review_text: Recommendation for getting one size up. Other than that, comfortable, great wuality shoes and very pretty
They were too way too short and little too wide. I wear this size in other shoes so very disappointed. Like the style, if only they fit.
if you can wear slippery shoes this shoe is for you if not don't buy it

reviews.title: not proper size
reviews.review_text: I ordered the size I normally wear. These are supposedly size 8. They are a half size too small.

reviews.title: Runs small
reviews.review_text: Too flat for my feet %26 got my size but runs small get one size up

reviews.title: small fit
reviews.review_text: these run small. they are short. it took 3 days for the smell to dissapate.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: These are cheaply made, too small, hardly any insole to speak of.
nvr received. had to gt refund. very disappointed-really liked %26 wanted!!!!!

reviews.title: Cheap made
reviews.review_text: Shoes felt like they were made of cardboard. Cheap and worthless
they sent me the wrong size. i ordered an 11 and they sent a 10

reviews.title: Poor quality
reviews.review_text: Does not hold its shape, poorest quality
they run too small i wear a 6.5 and ordered a 7 and they are small and don't really fit
The shoe was nicely made but ran too wide for my feet

reviews.title: great shoe and great value!
reviews.review_text: I like the fit and the color.

reviews.title: Don't buy
reviews.review_text: These are very cheaply made and not at all the soft feel of the look in the picture. Not worth it!
These shoes run a lot smaller than the stated size.

reviews.title: Summer shoes
reviews.review_text: These are beautiful!! i love them!! very comfy!! They shipped fast!! 4 days early!!

reviews.title: Too small
reviews.review_text: I'm a size 11 99.9% of the time. This is too small! Returning
I order Blue%26 brown CB sizes run smaller. They send me wrong sizes. I ended up returning both.

reviews.title: Ordered 9, received size 7
reviews.review_text: Nice shoes. However, company charges tax on S%26H. S%26H is not taxed in the U.S.

reviews.title: Lost shoes.
reviews.review_text: I can find my shoes. I have looked around, did what I could. Please help me. no pi tures.
